EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how Big Data transformed the Boston Red Sox - June 18th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/burlington> Join data technology experts from Pivotal to get the latest perspective on how big data analytics and applications are transforming organizations across enterprises with special guest speaker, Tim Zue, SVP of Business Development, Boston Red Sox.
Tim Zue will guide you through his journey providing analytical support behind strategic business decisions to ensure the ultimate customer experience for fans engaging with the Boston Red Sox and Fenway Park.
“Zue is now part of nearly every business decision made at Fenway, from ticket prices to game-day experiences.” -The Robot Builder who helps run the Boston Red Sox, Washington Post
After lunch, attendees will engage in hands-on data science and application development training using the market-leading Pivotal Big Data Suite.
Who Should Attend
In addition to addressing industry trends in big data, the sessions and hands-on workshop cover topics of interest to developers, architects, data scientists and technical managers.
